description: The CTWS has collaborated with Dr. Nilsen, USGS research chemist, who has studied contaminant loading in Pacific lamprey in the Columbia River Basin.  Recently, the CTWS has become aware of potential contaminants in Warm Springs River and Shitike Creek Basins.  Since larval lamprey spend years in the streambed sediments prior to outmigration they may accumulate contaminants and indicate health risks.
